text:
Today, I choose to talk about football. You maybe wonder why I choose this subject ? The answer is pretty simple, I definitely love football. Indeed, I spent a lot of time playing or watching it during my whole life.First of all, I start to like football by playing it at school when I was around 6 years old. Then, because my parents were not huge fan of football, I started basketball in club. Indeed, they like a lot more basketball so I was wanting them to come see me during competitive match. But then, my basketball was too much yelling on me so I decided to leave the club and to try another sport. That’s why I started tennis for a year, but I was not really good and not enough tired after training’s session. Finally, I chose to do what I like more : football and I was immediately a good experience. Indeed, I played football a lot with my friend before playing in club so I was already a pretty good player.
That’s how I became a football enjoyer. But let me introduce why I choose this subject right now. Let’s talk about the impact of football in my life and in every football enjoyers life’s. First of all, I think sport is a very important thing for health, and I think football is a quite complete sport. Indeed, football makes you practice a lot of muscles so we can say football has a huge impact on our health. But what I really want to talk about is the impact of the mental health : football is a sport that is gathering people around a same club or a same country. I admit that sometimes it has a « bad » impact because your favorite team loose a lot or loose an important match but I think this is nothing against what football brings when your team is winning or when you are singing with a bunch of people to enhance your favorite team… I think that wether you are a player or a supporter, football can bring so much emotion that I find this sport so beautiful !
Furthermore, as a sport lover I know that there is other sport that can bring those emotions. For example, I also love watching basketball, mma or tennis. But personally, I’m a little bit convinced that football is the sport which is the most impacting me.
To conclude, I think that sport or even e-sport are very important things to be interested in because it allows you to make friend, to travel, to share emotion, to go through so much feelings…
